What's your reading glasses value? Do you want to upload your prescription? EYEGLASS NUMBERS VISION SUMMARY TRACKING DATA ORDER GLASSES EMAIL YOUR RESULT ACCESS USER REPORT You must take 3 tests to unlock your new set of EyeGlass Numbers. You must take 2 more tests to unlock your EyeGlass Numbers. You must take 1 more test to unlock your EyeGlass Numbers. You have achieved your new set of EyeGlass Numbers! Your EyeGlass Numbers (EGNs) have been updated. Complete another eye test to update EGNs or contact support.
Don't have an account, register now First Name Last Name Gender Male Female No Preference Birth Year Region Membership Type Status Expiration Resend confirmation email Congratulations; you have finished the first step in registering your device. In order to finish your registration, you will receive a confirmation email. Please go to the confirmation email and click the "Confirm Your Account" button. Once your email is confirmed, then you can log into your EyeQue account.
#name,

Welcome to EyeQue.

Ready to get started? Tap the test icon to watch the tutorial, take a practice test or begin your vision test. Nice work #name.

Progress: You have completed 1 vision test.

You need to take 2 more tests to obtain your EyeGlass Numbers. #name,

Progress: You have completed 2 vision tests.

Almost there! You need to take 1 more test to obtain your EyeGlass Numbers. #name,

Progress: You have completed 3 vision tests.

Congratulations; below are your EyeGlass Numbers. You can take more vision tests to refine these numbers and improve the confidence level of your results. #name,

In your 6 months testing period, you have taken #numOfTests vision tests.

Your Eyeglass Numbers are not reliable due to the inconsistency of your test results. Please contact customer support to review your test. #name,

In your 6 months testing period, you have taken #numOfTests vision tests.

Your updated EyeGlass Numbers are below. #name,

Welcome back! It’s time to renew your EGNs. Your 6 month EGN period has expired. It’s time to renew your EGNs.
Vision can change frequently. We highly recommend you watch the tutorial and take the practice test before you start the Vision Test Getting Started Setup Miniscope Circle Image Test Preperation For accurate results, please remove your glasses or contacts Have you removed your glasses or contacts? Do you have screen protector on this phone? Yes No Tap the "+" or "-" buttons to move the red and the green lines until they are completely overlapped, then tap "Next" With the minscope attached, look for the red and green vertical lines. Make sure the eyecup of the miniscope is set to position 1.

If you are having trouble, relax and take your time. It helps to be in a darkened room and make sure your screen is set to maximum brightness.

If you can see the lines you are ready to take a practice test. Tap next.

If you tried and can't see the lines please contact support@eyeque.com Feel like you made a mistake? Just discard your test and begin another test! Congratulations on completing your first EyeQue test!
Take two more tests to achieve your EyeGlass Numbers. Save this test and you are almost there! Take one more test to get your EyeGlass Numbers. You did it! Your EyeGlass Numbers are just a click away! Hit save. Save this test to get your updated EyeGlass Numbers. Complete and save two more tests to achieve your updated EyeGlass Numbers. Complete and save one more tests to achieve your updated EyeGlass Numbers.
